# tune

## Overview

The goal of tune is to facilitate hyperparameter tuning for the
tidymodels packages. It relies heavily on
[recipes](https://recipes.tidymodels.org/),
[parsnip](https://parsnip.tidymodels.org/), and
[dials](https://dials.tidymodels.org/).

## Installation

Install from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages("tune", repos = "http://cran.r-project.org") #or your local mirror
```

or you can install the current development version using:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("tidymodels/tune")
```

## Examples

There are several package vignettes, as well as articles available at
[tidymodels.org](https://www.tidymodels.org/), demonstrating how to use
tune.

Good places to begin include:

- [Getting started with cell segmentation
  data](https://www.tidymodels.org/start/tuning/)
- [Getting started with Ames housing
  data](https://tune.tidymodels.org/articles/getting_started.html)

More advanced resources available are:

- [Basic grid search for an SVM
  model](https://www.tidymodels.org/learn/work/tune-svm/)
- [Iterative Bayesian optimization of a classification
  model](https://www.tidymodels.org/learn/work/bayes-opt/)
- [Advanced text mining
  example](https://tune.tidymodels.org/articles/extras/text_analysis.html)
- [Notes on optimizations and parallel
  processing](https://tune.tidymodels.org/articles/extras/optimizations.html)
- [Details on acquisition function for scoring parameter
  combinations](https://tune.tidymodels.org/articles/acquisition_functions.html)

## Contributing

This project is released with a [Contributor Code of
Conduct](https://contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html).
By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.

- For questions and discussions about tidymodels packages, modeling, and
  machine learning, please [post on Posit
  Community](https://forum.posit.co/new-topic?category_id=15&tags=tidymodels,question).

- If you think you have encountered a bug, please [submit an
  issue](https://github.com/tidymodels/tune/issues).

- Either way, learn how to create and share a
  [reprex](https://reprex.tidyverse.org/articles/articles/learn-reprex.html)
  (a minimal, reproducible example), to clearly communicate about your
  code.

- Check out further details on [contributing guidelines for tidymodels
  packages](https://www.tidymodels.org/contribute/) and [how to get
  help](https://www.tidymodels.org/help/).

# Package index

## Fit many models

- [`tune_grid()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/tune_grid.md)
  : Model tuning via grid search
- [`tune_bayes()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/tune_bayes.md)
  : Bayesian optimization of model parameters.
- [`expo_decay()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/expo_decay.md)
  : Exponential decay function
- [`prob_improve()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/prob_improve.md)
  [`exp_improve()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/prob_improve.md)
  [`conf_bound()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/prob_improve.md)
  : Acquisition function for scoring parameter combinations
- [`fit_resamples()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/fit_resamples.md)
  : Fit multiple models via resampling
- [`control_grid()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/control_grid.md)
  [`control_resamples()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/control_grid.md)
  [`new_backend_options()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/control_grid.md)
  : Control aspects of the grid search process
- [`control_bayes()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/control_bayes.md)
  : Control aspects of the Bayesian search process
- [`parallelism`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/parallelism.md)
  : Support for parallel processing in tune

## Fit one model

- [`fit_best()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/fit_best.md)
  : Fit a model to the numerically optimal configuration
- [`last_fit()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/last_fit.md)
  : Fit the final best model to the training set and evaluate the test
  set
- [`finalize_model()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/finalize_model.md)
  [`finalize_recipe()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/finalize_model.md)
  [`finalize_workflow()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/finalize_model.md)
  [`finalize_tailor()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/finalize_model.md)
  : Splice final parameters into objects
- [`control_last_fit()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/control_last_fit.md)
  : Control aspects of the last fit process

## Inspect results

- [`collect_predictions()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/collect_predictions.md)
  [`collect_metrics()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/collect_predictions.md)
  [`collect_notes()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/collect_predictions.md)
  [`collect_extracts()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/collect_predictions.md)
  : Obtain and format results produced by tuning functions
- [`show_notes()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/show_notes.md)
  : Display distinct errors from tune objects
- [`show_best()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/show_best.md)
  [`select_best()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/show_best.md)
  [`select_by_pct_loss()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/show_best.md)
  [`select_by_one_std_err()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/show_best.md)
  : Investigate best tuning parameters
- [`filter_parameters()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/filter_parameters.md)
  : Remove some tuning parameter results
- [`autoplot(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/autoplot.tune_results.md)
  : Plot tuning search results
- [`coord_obs_pred()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/coord_obs_pred.md)
  : Use same scale for plots of observed vs predicted values
- [`conf_mat_resampled()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/conf_mat_resampled.md)
  : Compute average confusion matrix across resamples

## Miscellaneous

- [`extract_workflow(`*`<last_fit>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract-tune.md)
  [`extract_workflow(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract-tune.md)
  [`extract_spec_parsnip(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract-tune.md)
  [`extract_recipe(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract-tune.md)
  [`extract_fit_parsnip(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract-tune.md)
  [`extract_fit_engine(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract-tune.md)
  [`extract_mold(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract-tune.md)
  [`extract_preprocessor(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract-tune.md)
  :

  Extract elements of `tune` objects

- [`extract_resample_weights()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/extract_resample_weights.md)
  : Extract resample weights from rset or tuning objects

- [`int_pctl(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/int_pctl.tune_results.md)
  : Bootstrap confidence intervals for performance metrics

- [`compute_metrics()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/compute_metrics.md)
  : Calculate and format metrics from tuning functions

- [`augment(`*`<tune_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/augment.tune_results.md)
  [`augment(`*`<resample_results>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/augment.tune_results.md)
  [`augment(`*`<last_fit>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/augment.tune_results.md)
  : Augment data with holdout predictions

- [`example_ames_knn`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/example_ames_knn.md)
  [`ames_wflow`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/example_ames_knn.md)
  [`ames_grid_search`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/example_ames_knn.md)
  [`ames_iter_search`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/example_ames_knn.md)
  : Example Analysis of Ames Housing Data

- [`add_resample_weights()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/add_resample_weights.md)
  : Add resample weights to an rset object

- [`calculate_resample_weights()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/calculate_resample_weights.md)
  : Calculate resample weights from resample sizes

## Developer functions

- [`merge(`*`<recipe>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/merge.recipe.md)
  [`merge(`*`<model_spec>`*`)`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/merge.recipe.md)
  : Merge parameter grid values into objects
- [`message_wrap()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/message_wrap.md)
  : Write a message that respects the line width
- [`.use_case_weights_with_yardstick()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/dot-use_case_weights_with_yardstick.md)
  : Determine if case weights should be passed on to yardstick
- [`.stash_last_result()`](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/reference/dot-stash_last_result.md)
  : Save most recent results to search path

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Acquisition
  functions](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/articles/acquisition_functions.md):

  What are acquisition functions? Learn how are they used to guide the
  exploration of the parameter space during Bayesian optimization.

- [Optimizations and parallel
  processing](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/articles/extras/optimizations.md):

  How can we evaluate candidate models in the shortest amount of time?

- [Introduction to
  tune](https://tune.tidymodels.org/dev/articles/tune.md):

  Start here if this is your first time using tune! You will learn about
  basic usage, grid search, and model optimization.
